pyscnet.Plotting¶

pyscnet.Plotting.net_plot¶

@author: mwu

pyscnet.Plotting.net_plot.dynamic_netShow(gnetdata, filename, node_size=50, node_community='all', html_size=['500px', '1800px'], bgcolor='#222222', font_color='white', **kwarg)[source]¶
Parameters

  • gnetdata – Gnetdata object

  • filename – str, save as filename

  • node_size – int, default 50.

  • node_community – str or list, default all.

  • html_size – list, default [“1200px”, “1600px”]

  • font_color – string, default white

  • bgcolor – string, default #222222

Returns

None

pyscnet.Plotting.net_plot.net_hierarchy_plot(gnetdata, filename=None, **kwarg)[source]¶

create a hierarchy gene net plot

Parameters

  • gnetdata – Gnetdata object

  • filename – str, default None.

  • kwarg – additional parameters passed to graph_tool.all.draw_hierarchy()

Returns

None

pyscnet.Plotting.net_plot.net_matrix_plot(gnetdata, filename=None, highlight_path=None, **kwarg)[source]¶
Parameters

  • gnetdata – Gnetdata object

  • filename – str, default None.

  • highlight_path – list, default None. a list of gene Nodes

  • kwarg – additional parameters passed to graph_tool.all.graph_draw()

Returns

None
